name: swipey.js
description: A simple and lightweight JS library to add swipe gestures to your app
author: Jordan-Morrison

scripts.build: cp swipey.js npm/swipey.min.js && echo 'export default swipey;' >> npm/swipey.min.js && echo $(minify npm/swipey.min.js) > npm/swipey.min.js && echo $(minify swipey.js) > dist/swipey.min.js
